mapper.select: select * from product p,product_detail pd, order_detail od, m_order mo where od.order_detail_no= #{orderDetailNo} and pd.product_detail_no = od.product_detail_no and mo.order_no = od.order_no and p.product_no = SUBSTR(od.PRODUCT_DETAIL_NO, 1,12)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail(order_detail_no,product_detail_no,psize,order_no,amount,price,state) values((select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') from dual) || 'D'||(select 10000000+(SELECT count(*) FROM order_detail)from dual),#{productDetailNo},#{psize},#{orderNo},#{amount},#{price},#{state})
